page.title: 09ALDBOROUGH SCHOOL
page.content: Fergus says that the school was built in Victorian times.It has been modernized.A school bus arrives at school at 8.45am.There are four classrooms,a hall,canteen and office. Behind the school is a large playing field.In summer we have sports on it and football in winter.There are six teachers and all of them come by car.Mr Walding is the head,Mr Thacker the deputy head,Mrs Langford teaches the infants and Mrs Simpson and Mrs McManus share the top class.Mrs Jarrold comes on a Tuesday aftertoon to take music.On Wednesday a bus takes the top class swimming to Aylsham high school.In the summer term there are outings to interesting places like Blakeney point,the Norfolk Broads , Cromer or West Runton rock pools. There are 85 children on roll.
